Class FridgeUserInboundPort

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
equipments.Fridge.connections.FridgeUserInboundPort
All Implemented Interfaces:
FridgeUserAndControlI, FridgeUserAndExternalControlI, FridgeUserCI, FridgeUserImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.InboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, Serializable, Remote
public class FridgeUserInboundPort extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort implements FridgeUserCI
The class FridgeUserInboundPort implements an inbound port for the FridgeUserCI component interface.

Description

White-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant
